text: Andrew Curtis (born 2 December 1972) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for York City, Peterborough United and Scarborough, and in non-League football for Kettering Town and Scarborough. ==References== Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Doncaster Category:English footballers Category:Association football wingers Category:York City F.C. players Category:Kettering Town F.C. players Category:Peterborough United F.C. players Category:Boston United F.C. players Category:Scarborough F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Andy Curtis
